description: Describes an anomaly or error with the application.

nested_items.name: Observation
nested_items.description: Information about the observation.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of the observation type.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the observation was first detected, in epoch seconds.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time when the observation ended, in epoch seconds.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The source type of the observation.

nested_items.name: SourceARN
nested_items.description: The source resource ARN of the observation.

nested_items.name: LogGroup
nested_items.description: The log group name.

nested_items.name: LineTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp in the CloudWatch Logs that specifies when the matched line occurred.

nested_items.name: LogText
nested_items.description: The log text of the observation.

nested_items.name: LogFilter
nested_items.description: The log filter of the observation.

nested_items.name: MetricNamespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the observation metric.

nested_items.name: MetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the observation metric.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: The unit of the source observation metric.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the source observation metric.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchEventId
nested_items.description: The ID of the CloudWatch Event-based observation related to the detected problem.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchEventSource
nested_items.description: The source of the CloudWatch Event.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchEventDetailType
nested_items.description: The detail type of the CloudWatch Event-based observation, for example, EC2 Instance State-change Notification.

nested_items.name: HealthEventArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Health Event-based observation.

nested_items.name: HealthService
nested_items.description: The service to which the Health Event belongs, such as EC2.

nested_items.name: HealthEventTypeCode
nested_items.description: The type of the Health event, for example, AWS_EC2_POWER_CONNECTIVITY_ISSUE.

nested_items.name: HealthEventTypeCategory
nested_items.description: The category of the Health event, such as issue.

nested_items.name: HealthEventDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the Health event provided by the service, such as Amazon EC2.

nested_items.name: CodeDeployDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The deployment ID of the CodeDeploy-based observation related to the detected problem.

nested_items.name: CodeDeployDeploymentGroup
nested_items.description: The deployment group to which the CodeDeploy deployment belongs.

nested_items.name: CodeDeployState
nested_items.description: The status of the CodeDeploy deployment, for example SUCCESS or FAILURE.

nested_items.name: CodeDeployApplication
nested_items.description: The CodeDeploy application to which the deployment belongs.

nested_items.name: CodeDeployInstanceGroupId
nested_items.description: The instance group to which the CodeDeploy instance belongs.

nested_items.name: Ec2State
nested_items.description: The state of the instance, such as STOPPING or TERMINATING.

nested_items.name: RdsEventCategories
nested_items.description: The category of an RDS event.

nested_items.name: RdsEventMessage
nested_items.description: The message of an RDS event.

nested_items.name: S3EventName
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 CloudWatch Event-based observation.

nested_items.name: StatesExecutionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the step function execution-based observation.

nested_items.name: StatesArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the step function-based observation.

nested_items.name: StatesStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the step function-related observation.

nested_items.name: StatesInput
nested_items.description: The input to the step function-based observation.

nested_items.name: EbsEvent
nested_items.description: The type of EBS CloudWatch event, such as createVolume, deleteVolume or attachVolume.

nested_items.name: EbsResult
nested_items.description: The result of an EBS CloudWatch event, such as failed or succeeded.

nested_items.name: EbsCause
nested_items.description: The cause of an EBS CloudWatch event.

nested_items.name: EbsRequestId
nested_items.description: The request ID of an EBS CloudWatch event.

nested_items.name: XRayFaultPercent
nested_items.description: The X-Ray request fault percentage for this node.

nested_items.name: XRayThrottlePercent
nested_items.description: The X-Ray request throttle percentage for this node.

nested_items.name: XRayErrorPercent
nested_items.description: The X-Ray request error percentage for this node.

nested_items.name: XRayRequestCount
nested_items.description: The X-Ray request count for this node.

nested_items.name: XRayRequestAverageLatency
nested_items.description: The X-Ray node request average latency for this node.

nested_items.name: XRayNodeName
nested_items.description: The name of the X-Ray node.

nested_items.name: XRayNodeType
nested_items.description: The type of the X-Ray node.
